value:
Heehee... There's no treasure I can't
steal. Time to make some coin! Oh,
you heard that? Forget I said anything!

When invaders ordered us to set our
village on fire, my cowardly father
was the first to pick up a torch.

Even a master thief has a sense of
honor. I give every coin I steal to
those who need it more.

I'll never let myself owe anything
to anyone. I won't allow anyone
to have that kind of power over me!

A castle as imposing as this one must
have a massive treasure vault. I'll find
out soon enough...

Your friend sent me to say hi and to
get the location of your treasure vault.
Haha! Just kidding!

Oh! My treasure-sense is tingling...
Shiny coins and sparkling jewelry!
They cry out to Cath, master thief!

This fighting should make for a
perfect distraction while I sneak
in and nab some good loot!

Eh. Don't sweat the small stuff.
We should focus on the bigger
picture, yeah?
Well, aren't you the generous one?

Quake in your boots, nobles! The
great Cath has come to Askr to
relieve you of your ill-gotten gains!

Oops! Heeheehee... I dropped my
scarf. Could you get that?$k$pYou know, you remind me of an old
flame. You might just be my type...$k$pOof! Why are you pushing me away?
Oh, this is awkward. OK, you caught
me. I'm sorry.$k$pYou're pretty perceptive. I spent a
lot of time perfecting that ruse.
Pretty slick, don't you agree?$k$pI thought you might have a nice
bunch of Orbs on you, that's
all. No harm, no foul, eh?
それっ
Sorry
きゃあっ
This is bad...
Ooh, how irritating!
How pathetic!
Don't sweat the small stuff!
All right, bye!
Hehe... I messed up...
Closed mouth giggle...
Hello, my name is Cath! I have come to Askr!
What? Me? What was I doing? Oh, nothing. *nervous chuckle*
I really hate bandits! They're disgusting.
Nobles sure are dumb. Always fighting wars.
As a master thief, I have sense of honor. I would never keep the gold I steal!
Do you think it's all right to do anything as long as you're "protecting" someone? Burn a village down, or destroy crops?
From here on, I'm naming you my number-two underling!
Alright, alright!
We'll get it done.
H-hi there!
